item.title: 日本高市称企业过于重视股东利益
item.description: 日本首相高市真奈周五表示，日本企业过于关注股东，她希望看到更多的公司财富分配给员工。【原文：Japanese businesses are focusing too much on shareholders, Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi said Friday, adding that she hopes to see more company wealth distributed to employees.】

item.title: 中国首次寒潮导致全国气温骤降
item.description: 未来几天，中国将迎来本季节的第一次寒潮，预计全国各地的寒冷程度将超过正常水平，这可能会影响电力需求。【原文：China will see its first cold wave of the season in the coming days, with chillier-than-normal conditions expected across the country, which may impact power demand.】

item.title: 中国经济数据为前景蒙上阴影，铜价收窄周涨幅
item.description: 中国 10 月份经济活动的降温幅度超过预期，对世界头号金属消费国的需求前景构成了压力，铜和铝的周涨幅随之缩小。【原文：Copper and aluminum trimmed their weekly gains after China’s economic activity cooled more than expected in October, weighing on the demand outlook for the world’s top metal-consuming country.】

item.title: 投资者称巴基斯坦债券涨势将随全球经济复苏而延续
item.description: 据投资者称，随着信用评级的上调和巴基斯坦政府重新进入全球债务市场的计划提振了市场情绪，巴基斯坦的美元债券可能会延续涨势。【原文：Pakistan’s dollar bonds will likely extend their rally as credit-rating upgrades and the government’s plans to re-enter global debt markets bolster sentiment, according to investors.】

item.title: 中国中芯国际预计 2026 年汽车和手机将面临内存短缺问题
item.description: 国际半导体制造公司（Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp. ）警告说，内存短缺可能会在 2026 年制约汽车和消费电子产品的生产，在主要芯片制造商优先考虑与人工智能加速器关键厂商英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp. warned that a shortage of memory may constrain car and consumer electronics production in 2026, flagging potential bottlenecks at a time major chipmakers are prioritizing business with AI accelerator linchpin Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 马来西亚就 1.12 亿美元的 1MDB 诉讼与贝尔公司进行调解
item.description: 马来西亚表示已与瑞士宝盛集团有限公司（Julius Baer Group Ltd.）展开调解谈判，以解决失败的 1MDB 发展基金的一个单位对这家瑞士银行提起的 1.12 亿美元的诉讼。【原文：Malaysia said it’s entered mediation talks with Julius Baer Group Ltd. in a bid to settle a $112 million lawsuit filed against the Swiss bank by a unit of the failed 1MDB development fund.】

item.title: 英伟达支持的 Firmus 公司融资 3.27 亿美元，推进人工智能数据中心发展
item.description: Firmus Technologies Ltd. 筹集了 5 亿澳元（约合 3.27 亿美元）资金，以加快其在澳大利亚各地建设可再生能源驱动的人工智能数据中心的步伐。【原文：Firmus Technologies Ltd. raised A$500 million ($327 million) to accelerate its push to build out renewable energy-powered artificial intelligence data centers across Australia.】

item.title: 中国 10 月钢铁产量创 2021 年以来最弱纪录
item.description: 由于国内需求疲软和钢厂进一步减产，10 月份中国钢铁产量继续下滑。【原文：China’s steel production continued to slide in October on softening domestic demand and deeper output cuts at mills.】

item.title: 安大略省教师退休金计划削减亚洲房地产团队人数
item.description: 安大略教师退休金计划将在明年年底前解散其设在新加坡的亚洲房地产团队，进一步削减其在该地区的实际存在。【原文：Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan will disband its Singapore-based Asia real estate team by the end of next year, further paring its physical presence in the region.】

item.title: 高盛追随国际能源署（IEA），修订看涨石油需求的展望
item.description: 高盛集团认为，由于能源需求强劲，全球石油需求增长的时间将比此前预期的更长，而就在几天前，国际能源机构刚刚缓和了对即将达到峰值的立场。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. sees global oil demand growth rising for longer than previously expected on robust energy demand, just days after the International Energy Agency tempered its stance on an imminent peak.】

item.title: 中国房地产困境使 10 亿美元贷款在短短几天内面临风险
item.description: 亚洲的银行正被卷入中国最近爆发的房地产危机，除非能达成延期或再融资协议，否则超过 10 亿美元的房地产抵押贷款将面临违约风险。【原文：Banks in Asia are getting caught in the latest flare-ups in China’s real estate crisis, as more than $1 billion in property-backed loans is at risk of default unless extension or refinancing deals can be reached.】

item.title: 印度卢比在印度央行干预和美国贸易协议有望达成后反弹
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 高盛认为中国的力量推动使其在人工智能竞赛中胜过美国
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：China’s massive buildout of power generation capacity will give it a leg up over the US in the race to expand data centers fueling artificial intelligence, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 韩国称与美国就贸易和安全问题达成共识
item.description: 韩国总统李在明表示，一份概述与美国达成的贸易和安全条款的联合概况介绍已经定稿，这标志着数月谈判的正式结束。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung said that a joint fact sheet outlining trade and security terms agreed with the US has been finalized, marking the formal conclusion of months of negotiations.】

item.title: 中国经济因投资下滑而增长乏力
item.description: 第四季度伊始，中国经济活动的降温幅度超出预期，投资出现前所未有的滑坡，工业产出增长放缓，再加上消费疲软的拖累，中国经济出现了前所未有的下滑。【原文：China’s economic activity cooled more than expected at the start of the fourth quarter, with an unprecedented slump in investment and slower growth in industrial output adding to a drag from sluggish consumption.】

item.title: PayPal 支持的 Pine Labs 将在耗资 4.4 亿美元的印度 IPO 后首次亮相
item.description: 印度支付技术提供商 Pine Labs Ltd. 完成 390 亿卢比（约合 4.4 亿美元）的首次公开募股后，将于周五在孟买开始交易，这是对投资者对印度金融技术推动力的一次检验。【原文：Pine Labs Ltd. is set to begin trading Friday in Mumbai after the Indian payment technology provider wrapped up its 39 billion rupees ($440 million) initial public offering, a test of investor appetite for the country’s fintech push.】

item.title: Disney+ 希望增加更多像 "Bluey "这样的短节目
item.description: 华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co.【原文：Walt Disney Co. wants to add more short-form video programming like the runaway kids hit Bluey to its Disney+ streaming service.】

item.title: 嘉能可、Hillhouse 投资中国铝冶炼厂 7 亿美元 IPO
item.description: 中国铝冶炼企业创鑫实业控股有限公司（Chuangxin Industries Holdings Ltd.）已开始接受香港首次公开募股的订单，吸引了包括瑞士大宗商品巨头嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）、资产管理公司希尔豪斯投资管理公司（Hillhouse Investment Management）和千禧管理公司（Millennium Management LLC）在内的大型投资者。【原文：Chinese aluminum smelter Chuangxin Industries Holdings Ltd. has started taking orders for its Hong Kong initial public offering, drawing in big investors including Swiss commodity giant Glencore Plc and asset managers Hillhouse Investment Management and Millennium Management LLC.】

item.title: 中国房价跌势加剧，刺激政策未能止跌
item.description: 由于近期的宽松措施未能重振奄奄一息的市场，10 月份中国房价下滑加剧，以疲软的数据结束了传统的销售旺季。【原文：China’s home-price slump worsened in October, ending a traditionally peak sales season with a weak reading as recent loosening measures failed to revive the moribund market.】

item.title: 碧桂园计划发行高达 130 亿美元的可转换债券
item.description: 中国开发商碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Chinese developer Country Garden Holdings Co. is planning to issue as much as $13 billion of mandatory convertible bonds, as it moves ahead with one of the nation’s biggest-ever restructurings amid a real estate crisis that sparked record defaults.】

item.title: MUFG 和汇丰银行大举投资印度 GIFT 城，向亚洲枢纽发出警告
item.description: 全球银行纷纷涌入印度这个最新的金融中心，以利用该国对美元债务激增的需求，从而从香港和新加坡等更成熟的亚洲中心抢走了一项关键业务。【原文：Global banks are flocking to India’s newest finance hub to take advantage of the nation’s surging demand for US-dollar denominated debt, taking a key business away from Asia’s more established centers such as Hong Kong and Singapore.】

item.title: Point72 的 Drossos 认为人工智能热潮将推动亚洲货币上涨
item.description: Point72 资产管理公司（Point72 Asset Management）的策略师兼经济学家索菲亚-德罗索斯（Sophia Drossos）认为，与人工智能热潮相关联的经济体的亚洲货币明年将因美元下滑而受益最大。【原文：Asian currencies from economies tied to the artificial intelligence boom are poised to benefit the most against a sliding dollar next year, according to Sophia Drossos, a strategist and economist at Point72 Asset Management.】

item.title: 人工智能前景黯淡，Kioxia 股价将大跌
item.description: NAND 存储器制造商 Kioxia Holdings Corp. 的当前季度业绩展望未达预期，而更大竞争对手的看涨言论又抬高了该公司的股价，因此该公司股价将跌至日跌幅限制。【原文：Kioxia Holdings Corp. shares were set to fall by their daily limit after the NAND memory maker’s current-quarter outlook missed expectations elevated by bullish comments from bigger rivals.】

item.title: 韩国准备利用养老基金稳定韩元汇率
item.description: 本周，韩元汇率跌至 16 年来的最低点，韩国承诺将与国有的国民养老金管理局协调，采取行动稳定韩元汇率。【原文：South Korea pledged to take action to stabilize the won, which approached a 16-year low this week, in coordination with state-owned National Pension Service.】

item.title: 招聘人员称，英国就业市场趋于稳定，工资水平有所下降
item.description: 一项备受关注的调查显示，英国上个月的工资几乎没有增长，这将为英国央行提供更多关于通胀压力正在缓解的信心。【原文：UK wages barely grew last month, according to a closely watched survey that will offer the Bank of England more confidence that inflationary pressures are easing.】

item.title: 玻利维亚新任中央银行行长承诺恢复独立性
item.description: 玻利维亚新任央行行长戴维-埃斯皮诺萨（David Espinoza）周四下午在拉巴斯政府宫举行的宣誓就职仪式上承诺，将恢复货币管理机构严格的技术性和独立性。【原文：Bolivia’s new central bank president David Espinoza pledged to restore a strictly technical and independent approach from the monetary authority during his swearing-in ceremony Thursday afternoon at the government palace in La Paz.】

item.title: Amtrak 告诉纽约 MTA，它将向一些地铁-北方线路开放
item.description: 美国国家客运铁路公司（Amtrak）在致纽约大都会运输局的一封信中表示，该公司愿意在 2027 年之前在纽约宾夕法尼亚车站增加有限的 Metro-North 铁路服务，但需要减少开往该车站的长岛铁路列车。【原文：Amtrak is open to adding limited Metro-North Railroad service into New York City’s Penn Station by 2027, but there would need to be fewer Long Island Rail Road trains into that station, the national passenger rail said in a letter to the Metropolitan Transportation Authority.】

item.title: 日本国内生产总值（GDP）可能出现下滑，这可能会促使人们呼吁大幅增加财政支出
item.description: 日本经济在今年夏天可能出现了两年来最大幅度的萎缩，周一公布的数据将为首相高市真奈提供一些潜在的理由，以制定一个庞大的经济方案。【原文：Japan’s economy likely shrank by the most in two years over the summer, with figures out Monday poised to offer Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi some potential justification for compiling a hefty economic package.】

item.title: OpenAI、苹果因竞争问题败诉马斯克xAI诉讼案
item.description: 德克萨斯州一名联邦法官裁定，苹果公司和 OpenAI 必须对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司和 xAI 提起的诉讼做出回应，该诉讼指控这两家公司合谋阻挠人工智能新兴市场的竞争。【原文：Apple Inc. and OpenAI must answer to a lawsuit filed by Elon Musk’s X Corp. and xAI accusing the companies of conspiring to thwart competition in emerging markets in artificial intelligence, a federal judge in Texas ruled.】

item.title: 受降息疑虑影响，黄金五日来首次下跌后保持稳定
item.description: 黄金在经历了五天来的首次下跌后开盘持稳，在美国政府结束停摆后，降息预期随之减弱。【原文：Gold opened steady after its first decline in five days, with expectations dwindling that an interest-rate cut will follow hot on the heels of the US government’s return from shutdown.】
